basics.name: Chaitanya Mehta
basics.label: Graduate Student
basics.summary: I am studying for an M.S. in computer engineering at NC State University, and have four years of experience as a software developer.

work.summary: Enhanced a Lighting System Design application that allows users to visually place equipment on floor plan, configure, connect them, and then generate comprehensive reports like bill of material, connection diagrams, etc.
highlights: Contributed to software design of application.
Used memory and performance analyzers to improve application experience.
Worked on proof of concepts for new and high-risk features.
Developed printable product reports using ReportFlowDocument.
Used ASP.NET web API to create a client for consuming RESTful services.
Mocked web services for use in test cases using NSubstitute framework.
Consumed third party libraries to support things like generating QR codes, exporting views to pdf, etc.
Used AutoCAD to create and alter blocks in dxf files.
Worked on bug-fixes and support issues.
Partook in project management, development, and agile/scrum processes.
Work on a full stack development project, utilizing .NET framework.
Added new devices and their properties in the app database.
Refactored direct calls to 3rd party zip library into an interface driven adapter class, to make library replacement easier.
Developed an internal application using Jira API to generate worklog report for current sprint.
